title: The School That Raped Everbody
itunes:title: The School That Raped Everbody
description:
In episode 100, Robert is joined by Miles Gray to discuss a school made for child molesters.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Odenwald school principal reveals horror abuse reports
  2. More sexual abuse victims at schools in Hesse
  3. Odenwaldschule board resigns in wake of abuse claims
  4. The politics of progressive education: The odenwaldschule in Nazi Germany
  5. Decades of Molestation Haunt Odenwaldschule
  6. Male Intergenerational Intimacy
  7. German principal admits school abuse stories ignored
  8. Abuse scandal hits elite progressive school
  9. Pedo-Sexuality
  10. How the Left Took Things Too Far
